job.title: Senior Blockchain Engineer - Customer Excellence
Project Manager 100% remote
job.description:
About us

We are the team behind the TechOps Core Unit of MakerDAO. We work directly with the Maker Protocol, one of the oldest and most robust protocols in Decentralised Finance and Ethereum blockchain. We support other Core Units and startups from the Maker Ecosystem.

The role

We are looking for a skilled Project Manager with experience in technical account management. In this role, you will be responsible for standard project management tasks, including collecting the requirements, backlog management, prioritization and tracking, budget management, and reporting. You will also be in charge of client relationships and business development.

About you

  • You’re enjoying working in an open-source (or just want to start your experience there).

  • You’re passionate about De-Fi and Blockchain (or just want to start your adventure with it).

  • You’re a collaborator at heart that loves to share knowledge with others and work in transparent and collaborative environments.

  • You’re willing and able to learn new things fast.

Requirements:

What you’ll need

  • Minimum 3 years of experience as a Project Manager in IT infrastructure or software development working in agile/kanban/scrum environment.

  • Experience working and collaborating in a 24/7 digital native environment (Discord, JIRA, Notion).

  • Fundamental understanding of project management.

  • High communication skills, including offering presentations.

  • Familiarity with project management tools (Jira or similar), Google Sheets, etc.

  • Experience producing various reports using tools like Jira ie. time tracking, roadmap progression etc.

  • Familiarity with working in a startup environment in a remote-first environment.

The nice to haves

  • Experience as an account manager in IT infrastructure or software development.

  • Experience in creating pricing plans.

  • General knowledge of crypto, blockchain primitives, DeFi basics, Maker Protocol.

Responsibilities

  • Collecting business requirements.

  • Managing the backlog, prioritizing and tracking tasks, and reporting on progress.

  • Budget management, monitoring, and monthly reporting.

  • Creating and presenting offers, creating and negotiating contracts.

  • Business development and maintenance of good relations with our customers.

Compensation package

  • Competitive fixed annual salary.

  • Attractive MKR incentives (learn more about MKR and MKR Compensation Plan).

  • Ability to transit into the fast-growing DeFi/crypto/blockchain domain and work in the Decentralised Autonomous Organisation (aka DAO - learn more about DAOs And Why You Should Pay Attention) for the open-source project.

  • Possibility to learn the crypto space and be a part of a scaling team with excellent potential for personal growth.

job.description:
We're looking for a Senior Marketing Manager to help establish processes and strategy for multiple marketing disciplines (email, social media, etc.). This role will be central to supporting our professional athlete clients' revenue growth. You’ll work cross-functionally with team members across the marketing, creative, community, data and product teams on bringing data-backed decision-making to projects big and small.

About the role:
  • Own, design, develop and all-in-all revolutionize our athlete marketing process, with a goal of creating a unique, powerful and consistent brand voice that helps us achieve our company goals.
  • Write consistently compelling, tight and impactful copy across blogs, emails, social campaigns, marketing materials and more.
  • Lead and launch best in class email, push-notification & written marketing campaigns designed to acquire new customers.
  • Write and/or proofread all blogs, emails & marketing materials for clarity, grammar, accuracy and overall quality.
  • Working in tandem with our Creative team, develop best-in-class, mobile-friendly, high-performing blog, email & push notification templates.

    • Our ideal candidate:
  • Has 3-7 years experience managing/overseeing marketing operations and 10+ years total marketing experience.
  • You thrive under pressure, love working as part of a fast-moving team, can deal with feedback and needs from multiple perspectives and enjoy working with passionate people.
  • You excel at producing high-quality work on quick deadlines, while also being able to step back and develop (and communicate) a larger vision.
  • You have a knack for numbers -- you’re able to read data to determine patterns and gain insights, and then explain them at a high level to guide future decision-making.
  • You’ve got an elite understanding of blog, email & push-notification marketing as a growth, engagement and loyalty tool, including a full knowledge of industry best practices.
  • Passion for community with previous experience and demonstrated ability to communicate to all levels within an organization.
  • Understands the rigors and needs of a small team and startup environment.
    • More about Dapper Labs:

    Dapper Labs is the world's first blockchain entertainment company. We are the creators of industry-leading experiences including CryptoKitties and NBA Top Shot, as well as Dapper Wallet, the simplest way to manage your assets and use the blockchain. We are also the original developers behind Flow, a new decentralized blockchain designed from the ground up for scalability and ease of use.

    Our mission at Dapper Labs is to make the world a more open, empowering, and enjoyable place through consumer adoption of decentralized technologies. We have raised over $600M from leading VCs including Fred Wilson (USV) and Chris Dixon as well as Venrock, Samsung, Google Ventures, Coatue, NBA players, and global artists, among others. Dapper Labs partners include the NBA and NBPA, the NFL-PA, Ubisoft, Warner Music, Turner, Dr. Seuss, Genies, and the UFC, as well as 100+ others.

job.title: Ledger Connect Product Manager - Developer Ecosystem
job.description:
Founded in 2014, Ledger is the leader in security and infrastructure solutions for cryptocurrencies and blockchain applications. Headquartered in Paris, with offices in Vierzon, Hong Kong and New York, Ledger has a team of 400+ professionals developing a variety of products and services to safeguard and protect crypto-assets for individuals and companies – including the Ledger hardware wallets line (Ledger Nano S) already sold at 4 million units in 200  countries.

To sustain the company's growth and the permanent market demand for additional cryptocurrencies, token, and services on its retail products (Ledger Nano S, Ledger Nano X, Ledger Live), Ledger is looking for a highly motivated and talented individual with extensive interest for crypto-markets to become the Product Manager of our new Ledger Connect initiative within the Developer Ecosystem team.

Location : Paris 2nd district

Missions
  • Make it easy for developers to integrate support for ledger devices from both apps,
  • Provide a reliable and consistent way for users to connect and use their Ledger with 3rd party products,
  • Expand and support the entire ecosystem of wallets and applications already compatible with Ledger hardware wallets,
  • In charge of establishing the Ledger Connect technical framework (with engineering team) and ensuring its successful completion,
  • Prepare specifications, review tickets, backlog, and make sure the developer team always has what they need to complete their sprint activities,
  • Maintain and improve Ledger documentation and processes regarding Ledger Connect,
  • Liaise with the product team, business and marketing departments to ensure our Ledger Connect features and toolsets are widely available and easily accessible,
  • Monitor emerging trends in cryptocurrencies adoption, blockchain technology, and blockchain services in general to help fine tune our Ledger Connect strategy,
  • Communicate with external developers, and gather their feedback to improve our solution,
  • Participate in crypto events to promote Ledger Connect solution.

    • Requirements and qualifications
  • Having a Diploma in Computer Science, Engineering or top-tier Business school,
  • Relevant experience in software development and knowledge about blockchain technology,
  • Proven experience as a Product Owner / Product Manager in a technical area,
  • Adversarial thinking Fluent in  English (French or another language as a bonus).

    • Good to have
  • Passionate about blockchain and cryptocurrencies,
  • Outstanding communication and presentation skills,
  • Desire to go deep down the blockchain rabbit hole,
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills,
  • Previous experience in a start-up company or in fintech preferred.

    • Benefits
  • Competitive compensation package and ESOP according to Company policy,
  • Flexible working hours, remote-friendly environment, casual office atmosphere,
  • Strong focus on personal development Internal talks, technical meetups and hackathons,
  • Comprehensive health insurance policy offering extensive medical, dental and vision care coverage,
  • Employee discount on Ledger products.
    • Ledger guarantees equal opportunity for all during the recruitment process, without any distinction of gender, ethnicity, religion, sexual orientation, social status, disability or age.

job.title: Video Editor & Motion Designer (Social Media Team)
job.description:
Binance is the global blockchain company behind the world’s largest digital asset exchange by trading volume and users, serving a greater mission to accelerate cryptocurrency adoption and increase the freedom of money.

Are you looking to be a part of the most influential company in the blockchain industry and contribute to the crypto-currency revolution that is changing the world?

Editors are the final storytellers, having the great responsibility of crafting videos that will make a lasting impact on the audience. 

We’re seeking a creative-minded video editor/motion designer to join our social media team full time, a skilful storyteller who can turn complex ideas into highly engaging and shareable content through their sense of pacing, design typography, and data visualization. 

Our ideal candidate is a skilled video editor that can create content cross-platform. The right person for this position would be able to work with content creators and execute tasks as given but also come up with creative content and add value to the social media team and contribute towards video content across platforms.

This is a full time remote position, can be based in any locations globally.

Responsibilities:
  • Work with video creators on the social team to edit and/or create videos for cross-platform usage (primary focus)
  • Research, conceptualize and produce videos on a wide range of crypto-related topics working with the global social team
  • Produce high quality, engaging, original content that can be used cross-platform
  • Have an understanding of the technicalities of live streaming on platforms like YouTube
  • Help improve video content across teams
  • Produce videos efficiently employing various elements, including video assets, photo assets, logos, typography, data viz, animations, etc.
  • Source archival content, stock video, imagery, music, voice-over and sound effects
  • Analyze social media landscape to supply actionable insight (in real-time) to both the social and greater marketing team with hot topics, breaking news, sentiment/market observations
  • Experiment with different versions of an edit, exploring multiple directions if needed
  • Awareness of what competitors are doing in video and staying one step ahead
  • Think Social-First and have the creativity to multiply content 5x that will be posted across various Social Media platforms (Memes, Gifs, TikTok Videos, Instagram Stories, etc.)
  • Have fun

    • Requirements:
  • 2 -3+ years of experience in Video Editing and Motion Design
  • Proficient in using Adobe Suite, especially After Effects, Photoshop, Illustrator, and Premiere
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with a 1-2 day turnaround time on finished pieces
  • Experience in finding and collecting relevant archival footage and other material to be incorporated into edits
  • Proactive attitude in problem solving and suggestions, able to implement feedback with ease and on time
  • Experienced in producing polished, professional video edits and motion graphics work, carried from concept to completion, largely independently
  • Knowledge of the blockchain/crypto space is a plus but not necessary. However, a hunger to learn as much as possible about the ever-evolving crypto world is a must
  • Stop-motion, painting, music, and nearly any other creative skill is a plus
  • Experience working on a remote team preferred
  • Bonus points if you are a content creator and not shy in front of the camera
    • Working at Binance
    • Do something meaningful; Be a part of the future of finance technology and the no.1 company in the industry
    • Fast moving, challenging and unique business problems
    • International work environment and flat organisation
    • Great career development opportunities in a growing company
    • Possibility for relocation and international transfers mid-career
    • Competitive salary
    • Flexible working hours, Casual work attire
